item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 23 Sep 2025
item.description:
1. Introduction to the Dune build system, by OCamlPro
  2. memprof-limits (first official release): Memory limits, allocation limits, and thread cancellation, with interrupt-safe resources
  3. mlfront-shell - reference implementation of a build system
  4. Zanuda -- OCaml linter experiment
  5. YOCaml, a framework for static site generator
  6. Lwt.6.0.0~beta (direct-style, multi-domain parallelism)
  7. schm-ocaml
  8. detri cmd
  9. seven ocaml tutorials
  10. Ortac/Wrapper: a new plugin for specification driven unit testing
  11. Other OCaml News
